title: Maggie Moore and the Secret School Diary
description: A book aimed at anyone aged 9 -12ish. This book is the diary of Maggie Moore, a girl in an English primary school. It follows her for one school year as she encounters a number of funny and embarrassing situations. She has the worst part in the school play, accidentally becomes an internet sensation, takes part in a talent show and tries to break a new world record. It is a really funny book. There are also several illustrations throughout.
author: Firna Rex Shaw
